item.title: Git Handy commands
item.description: Scenario 1: Remove a Modified File from Git pull request Switch to the branch from which you created the pull request: $ git checkout pull-request-branch Overwrite the modified file(s) with the file in another branch, let’s consider it’s master: git checkout origin/master -- src/main/java/HelloWorld.java Commit and push it to the remote: git commit -m "Removed a modified file from pull request" git push origin pull-request-branch Scenario 2: Update the commit user name and email in Git repo git config user.
